SA05n833:4: vande bhaktyā praṇamitaśirasā nirvṛtā yena buddhāḥ || 1 ||
SA05n833:6: śrāvastyāṃ lumbikāyāṃ kuśinagaravare kāpilākhye ca sthāne |
SA05n833:8: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalabalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān || 2 ||
SA05n833:9: kailāśe hemakūṭe himavati nilaye mandare merūśṛṅge
SA05n833:12: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalavalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān || 3 ||
SA05n833:13: kāśmīre cīnadeśe khasatavarapure balkale siṃhale vā
SA05n833:16: ye cānye dhātucaityā daśabalavalitā tān namasyāmi buddhān || 4 ||
SA05n833:17: ye ca syurdhātugarbhā daśabalatanujāḥ kumbhasaṃjñāśca caityāḥ
SA05n833:19: pātāle ye ca bhūmyāṃ giriśikharagatā ye ca vittāḥ samantād
SA05n833:20: buddhānāṃ ye ca vimbāḥ pratidinasukṛtastān namasyāmi buddhān || 5 ||
